attributes.action: the RAF to airdrop food to starving civilians in Madaya, Syria
attributes.additional_details: A coalition of Syrian groups in the UK is asking for this as a matter of urgency, including  Kurds House and Rethink Rebuild in Manchester, the Syrian Association of Yorkshire, Scotland4Syria, The Syrian Welsh Society, and Syria Solidarity UK www.syriauk.org
attributes.background:
In Madaya, 40,000 people are under siege by the Assad regime and Hezbollah, and are being deliberately starved.

The UK has dropped bombs on Syria: they are no help to the starving. Show what good the UK do for people inside Syria!  Begin RAF food aid drops to Madaya now.
